params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

subcommands.name: noeviction
subcommands.desc: returns errors when memory limit is reached

subcommands.name: allkeys-lru
subcommands.desc: removes less recently used keys first

subcommands.name: volatile-lru
subcommands.desc: removes less recently used keys first that have an expiry set

subcommands.name: volatile-random
subcommands.desc: evicts random keys but only those that have an expiry set

subcommands.name: volatile-ttl
subcommands.desc: only evicts keys with an expiry set and a short TTL
